entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon.
